title: Wall Street Week | Dudley on Powell, Saudi Arabia Tourism, Israeli Tech Economy, Megapass Skiing
description: This week, former New York Fed President Bill Dudley discusses the Justice Department’s criminal investigation of Fed Chair Jay Powell. And,Saudi Arabia is betting big on tourism to diversify its economy and transform how the world sees the Kingdom. Plus, Israel’s startup economy after the war, and how the Epic and Ikon passes transformed skiing, boosted growth, and forced resorts and skiers to weigh scale against experience. (Source: Bloomberg)
